ins.name: Instructor
ins.setBonus4: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

ber.name: Berserker
ber.setBonus4: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

exl.name: The Exile
exl.setBonus4: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

ros.name: Resolution of Sojourner
ros.setBonus4: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

mar.name: Martial Artist
mar.setBonus2: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
mar.setBonus4: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

dew.name: Defender's Will
dew.setBonus4: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

tim.name: Tiny Miracle
tim.setBonus4: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

brh.name: Brave Heart
brh.setBonus4: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.

gam.name: Gambler
gam.setBonus4: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

sch.name: Scholar
sch.setBonus4: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

glf.name: Gladiator's Finale
glf.setBonus4: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

wat.name: Wanderer's Troupe
wat.setBonus4: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

viv.name: Viridescent Venerer
viv.setBonus4: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

thf.name: Thundering Fury
thf.setBonus4: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

ths.name: Thundersoother
ths.setBonus4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.

cwf.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
cwf.setBonus4: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

lav.name: Lavawalker
lav.setBonus4: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.

arp.name: Archaic Petra
arp.setBonus4: Upon obtaining a crystal created through a Geo Elemental Reaction, all party members gain 35% Elemental DMG Bonus to that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

reb.name: Retracing Bolide
reb.setBonus2: Increases the effectiveness of shields by 35%
reb.setBonus4: Gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG while under the protection of a shield.

mab.name: Maiden Beloved
mab.setBonus4: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

nob.name: Noblesse Oblige
nob.setBonus4: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

blc.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
blc.setBonus4: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

icb.name: Icebreaker
icb.setBonus4: When a character attacks an enemy affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the enemy is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

oce.name: Ocean Conquerer
oce.setBonus4: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

one_pwis.name: Prayers for Wisdom
one_pwis.setBonus1: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.

one_pspt.name: Prayers for Springtime
one_pspt.setBonus1: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.

one_pill.name: Prayers for Illumination
one_pill.setBonus1: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.

one_pdes.name: Prayers for Destiny
one_pdes.setBonus1: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.
